text: Immersed in the Dinas Advertiser, was the Rev. Edwards. Now he put down his paper, folded it, and glanced idly out of the window. Looked again, eyes starting from his head."God bless my immortal soul," he cried. "Never mind your immortal moment when we should be running into Llangrwl bus station..

Looked again, eyes starting from his head."God bless my immortal soul," he cried. "Never mind your immortal moment when we should be running into Llangrwl bus station..
